name: Progress Bar Color
description: This mod lets you customize your progress bar color!You can set your normal/practice progress bar manually or follow your player colors.

normal-progress-bars.name: Normal Progress Bars
normal-progress-bars.description: Modify Levels' Normal Progress Bar Colors in case you wanna set them in the same style everywhere

normal-default-mode.name: Mode
normal-default-mode.description:
Pick the way you hope to set your <cg>Normal Progress Bar</c> color
Original: Green
Follow: Sync with player color channel
Manual: Set it manually

normal-default-follower.name: Follower
normal-default-follower.description: Pick the color channel you hope your <cg>Normal Progress Bar</c> color follow

normal-default-color.name: Manual Color
normal-default-color.description: Pick the color manually for your <cg>Normal Progress Bar</c>
